pages.text: Wiltum Tree leaves have a small chance to drop Wiltum Fruit, which can reduce Garhenna depletion due to its strong healing properties. From it you can craft a Wiltum Cocktail, which is able to neutralize certain types of poisons. You can also craft a Wiltum Elixir that will lower your depletion level and give temporary Garhenna protection for a long time. Wiltum Fruits can also be stored in large boxes.
